Perceptor:

Perceptor laughted and said "I'm old, young one, enough old due I've 
learned not trust in any one, due that I'm alive. I see that you're 
a perfect warrior and willing to learn  new things... Why not we 
drink something and chat a while, we can learn a lot things each 
othet... What do think? "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> DeathSteel::
>  
> He looked at Perceptor, noting the tone of the bot's voice. "Look, 
> how in the pit is one to learn how to fit in around here if no bot 
> will talk to you, show you around, or even give you a task to 
> complete? Since I am new, I can safely bet you don't trust me. So 
how 
> in the pit am I to prove anything if nobot will give up that 
chance 
> to prove it?" He turned and took a step towards the doorway. He 
> stopped and looked at Perceptor. "You should try to put worthy 
bots 
> around you. It would make you look like a true leader, one who 
could 
> see how to use the talents around him." With that, he turned and 
> walked out into the hall. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor:
> > 
> > "What're you doing here???"said Perceptor with suspicion
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> 
wrote:
> > > DeathSteel::
> > > 
> > > He stood in the Predacon base and wandered around. He stood in 
> the 
> > > main comm room and leaned against the wall. Folding his arms 
in 
> > front 
> > > of his chest, he waited for the right moment. Then, he would 
> lower 
> > > the shields as fast as he could. For now, he would bide his 
time.
